main_definition: To make a rough calculation or judgment of the value, number, quantity, or extent of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A preliminary assessment based on available information.
meanings_and_examples.example: The carpenter gave an estimate for repairing my kitchen cabinets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An approximation of a quantity, number, or value that is not precise but sufficient for the purpose at hand.
meanings_and_examples.example: She estimated there were about 100 people in the crowd based on her view from the balcony.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To express an opinion of the approximate cost, number, or quantity of something without being exact.
meanings_and_examples.example: The contractor provided a price estimate for painting my living room at $500.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A statement indicating that it is impossible to provide an exact figure due to uncertainties and variables involved.
meanings_and_examples.example: Our company cannot give you an exact figure on the time required for this project as there are too many unknown factors.
